name: Scavenger
description: Increases the amount of items found while scavenging shelters.

name: Field Medic
description: Increases the effectiveness of all healing items by 25%.

name: Guerrilla Fighter
description: If you start combat in a forest, perform a surprise attack before the first turn begins.

name: Expert Hunter
description: +50% resources from killed animals and automatically reveals creature weaknesses.

name: Field Armorer
description: Crafted weapons have +10 durability and require -20% crafting time.

name: Wasteland Runner
description: Movement takes 2 minutes less and +25% fatigue resistance.

name: Combat Master
description: +1 damage with all melee weapons. Weapons lose 50% less durability.

name: Hawk's Eye
description: +2 bonus to ranged attack rolls. Automatically reveals traps.

name: Veteran Survivor
description: +50% HP from healing. -25% hunger and hydration consumption.

name: Twilight Shadow
description: +4 to escape checks. The first attack in combat is always a critical hit.
